msContents.summary: Side 1 (against the fibers): Book of Amos 2:6-8 Side 2 (with the fibers): Book of Amos 2:9-12

msItemStruct.note: Text is written on both sides. Side 1 has 16 lines written against the fibers (plus 6 missing lines). Side 2 has 16 lines written with the fibers. Top and left margins are visible on Side 1 (against the fibers). Top and right margins are visible on Side 2 (with the fibers).
Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology collection

supportDesc.support: 12.6 X 16.4cm. Missing pieces from both the left and the right sides. Several wormholes throughout the papyrus.

provenance.p: Excavated by Grenfell and Hunt (1902-3) on behalf of the Egyptian Exploration Fund, and donated to the University Museum in return for its support (1909, Dr. Parrish Collection).

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
